Introduction

Kim Hyun-jung, better known as Hoody, is a South Korean singer-songwriter under AOMG. She debuted with the single “My Ride” on September 24, 2013, and debuted in the same year as a member of the all-female underground hip-hop crew Amourette (AMRT). However, she left the group a bit later as she felt that it was too difficult to adapt as a member of a hip-hop group.
